__e: But Mama, I'm tired of everybody calling' me a dummy. I'm tired of not havin' any friends.
You are a fool and I will show you none.
I have been a fool for too long.
I know you're having fun with your sister, her being, well, a dullard and all... but if Kelly doesn't get out of high school, she'll never leave home.
You may not have been telling us by - Being a jerk?
That's why he's so dumb... and knows nothing!
